Umineko Project (UP): They had eaten breakfast at a coffee shop in the station building.
Steam (ST): They had eaten breakfast at a coffee shop in the station building.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 彼女らは朝食を駅ビルの喫茶店で取った。
Russian (RU): Они позавтракали в привокзальном кафе.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Elas haviam tomado o café da manhã em uma cafeteria no prédio da estação.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座母女是在車站大廈裡的咖啡館裡用的早餐。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座母女是在车站大厦里的咖啡馆里用的早餐。
Italian (IT): Avevano fatto colazione in una caffetteria situata dentro la stazione...
Turkish (TR): İstasyon binasındaki bir kafede kahvaltı etmişlerdi.

Umineko Project (UP): ...By chance, the inside of the shop had been decorated with Halloween colors, since it was October.
Steam (ST): ...By chance, the inside of the shop had been decorated with Halloween colors, since it was October.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …その店は、たまたま１０月だったこともあり店内をハロウィンカラーでレイアウトしていた。
Russian (RU): ...Так получилось, что внутри кафе было украшено в цвета Хэллоуина, поскольку на дворе стоял октябрь.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Por coincidência, o interior da loja tinha sido decorado com cores de Halloween, já que era outubro.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …可能由於正好是十月份的關係吧，這家咖啡館的內部布置成了萬聖夜的顏色。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …可能由于正好是十月份的关系吧，这家咖啡馆的内部布置成了万圣夜的颜色。
Italian (IT): Coincidenzialmente, dato che era il mese di ottobre, l'interno del negozio era stato decorato con i colori di Halloween.
Turkish (TR): ...Şans eseri, Ekim ayı olduğu için dükkânın içi Cadılar Bayramı desenleriyle süslenmişti.

Umineko Project (UP): It seemed that Maria had really taken a liking to that.
Steam (ST): Maria had seemed to be awfully pleased with that.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): It seemed that Maria had been awfully pleased with that.
PC Japanese (JP): それをひどく真里亞が気に入ってしまったらしい。
Russian (RU): Похоже, что Мария была этому невероятно рада.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Parecia que Maria havia realmente gostado daquilo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 而這好像很合真里亞的喜好。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 而这好像很合真里亚的喜好。
Italian (IT): Maria sembrava esserne incredibilmente contenta.
Turkish (TR): Maria bundan gerçekten hoşlanmış gibi görünüyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): Ever since, she had been making a fuss inside the train about wanting to have a Halloween festival, without caring that she was attracting the attention of others.
Steam (ST): For quite some time, she talked loudly inside the train about wanting to have a Halloween festival, without caring that she was attracting the attention of others.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): And since then, she had kept on making a fuss inside the train about wanting to have a Halloween festival, without caring that she was attracting the attention of others.
PC Japanese (JP): さっきから電車内で、人目もはばからず、ハロウィンのお祭りがしたいしたいと騒ぎ続けていた。
Russian (RU): И из‐за этого она продолжала шуметь внутри поезда о своём желании отметить Хэллоуин, не заботясь о том, что этим привлекает внимание других людей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Desde então, ela esteve fazendo um alvoroço dentro do trem sobre querer ter um festival de Halloween, sem ligar se estava atraindo a atenção dos outros.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 從剛才開始，她就一點不顧周圍的目光，在電車裡“想過萬聖夜，想過萬聖夜”地吵個不停。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 从刚才开始，她就一点不顾周围的目光，在电车里“想过万圣夜，想过万圣夜”地吵个不停。
Italian (IT): Incurante dell'attenzione che stava attirando su di sé nel treno, per un bel po' continuò a strepitare sul voler tenere una festa di Halloween.
Turkish (TR): O andan beri trenin içinde, başkalarının dikkatini çekmesine aldırmadan, bir Cadılar Bayramı festivali yapmak istediğine dair yaygara koparıyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): Halloween is popular in Europe and America, but people are hardly familiar with it at all in Japan.
Steam (ST): Halloween is popular in Europe and America, but people aren't that familiar with it in Japan.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Halloween is popular in Europe and America, but people aren't familiar with it at all in Japan.
PC Japanese (JP): 欧米では盛んなそのお祭りも、日本ではあまり馴染みがない。
Russian (RU): Хэллоуин популярен в Европе и Америке, но в Японии люди практически незнакомы с ним.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Halloween é popular na Europa e na América, mas as pessoas não estão muito familiarizadas com ele no Japão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 這個在歐美頗為熱鬧的節日，在日本卻並沒怎麼被大眾接受。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 这个在欧美颇为热闹的节日，在日本却并没怎么被大众接受。
Italian (IT): Essa è una ricorrenza ben nota in Europa e in America, ma non è molto conosciuta in Giappone.
Turkish (TR): Cadılar Bayramı Avrupa ve Amerika'da popüler olsa da bu bayram Japonya'da neredeyse hiç bilinmez.

Umineko Project (UP): The shopping district was colorfully decorated with orange pumpkins, but the costume parades of children demanding sweets and saying "trick or treat" were nowhere in sight.
Steam (ST): The shopping district was colorfully decorated with orange pumpkins, but the costume parades of children demanding sweets and saying "trick or treat" were nowhere in sight.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The shopping district was colorfully decorated with orange pumpkins, but the costume parades of children demanding sweets and saying 'trick or treat' were nowhere in sight.
PC Japanese (JP): 商店街のレイアウトは橙色のカボチャをカラフルに飾るが、トリックオアトリートと尋ねながらお菓子をねだる子どもの仮装行列が現れたりはしなかった。
Russian (RU): Торговый район был красочно украшен оранжевыми тыквами, но детей в маскарадных костюмах, требующих конфеты и говорящих "сладость или гадость", нигде не было видно.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O distrito de compras estava todo colorido, decorado com abóboras laranjas, mas os desfiles de crianças pedindo doces e dizendo "{i:trick or treat}" não podia ser visto em lugar algum.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然商店街上裝飾了不少艷麗的橙色南瓜，但並沒有出現說著“不給糖就搗蛋”來討糖果的孩子們舉行的化裝游行。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然商店街上装饰了不少艳丽的橙色南瓜，但并没有出现说着“不给糖就捣蛋”来讨糖果的孩子们举行的化装游行。
Italian (IT): Il quartiere commerciale era vivacemente addobbato con zucche arancioni, ma non c'era alcuna traccia di bambini che sfilavano in costume chiedendo dolci con ‘dolcetto o scherzetto’.
Turkish (TR): Alışveriş bölgesi turuncu balkabaklarıyla rengarenk süslenmişti, ancak şeker isteyen ve "şaka mı şeker mi" diyen kostümlü çocuklar ortalıkta görünmüyordu.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "Uu! I want a Halloween festivaaal! I don't want to wear these clothes, I want to look like a wiiiitch! Uu‐uu!"
Steam (ST): "Uu-! I want a Halloween festival! I don't wanna wear these clothes, I wanna look like a witch! Uu-uu-!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Uu-! I want a Halloween festival! I don't want to wear these clothes, I want to look like a witch! Uu-uu-!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「うー！　ハロウィン祭りがしたいー！　こんなお洋服やだ、魔女の格好がいいー！　うーうー！」
Russian (RU): "У‐у! Я хочу на фестиваль Хэллоуина! Я не хочу носить эту западную одежду, я хочу быть похожей на ведьму! У‐у, у‐у!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Uu! Quero um festivaaal de Halloween! Não quero vestir essas roupas, quero parecer uma bruuuuxa! Uu‐uu!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗚——！想過萬聖夜——！不想穿這種洋裝，想穿魔女的衣服——！嗚——嗚——！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「呜——！想过万圣夜——！不想穿这种洋装，想穿魔女的衣服——！呜——呜——！」
Italian (IT): "Uuh! Voglio fare una festa di Halloween! Non voglio vestirmi così, voglio sembrare una strega! Uuh, uuh!"
Turkish (TR): "Uu! Cadılar Bayramı festivali istiyoruum! Bu kıyafetleri giymek istemiyorum, cadı gibi görünmek istiyooorum! Uu-uu!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Umineko Project (UP): "The family conference isn't for playing. We're going to meet Grandfather, so you have to dress up nice."
Steam (ST): "The family conference isn't for playing. We're going to meet Grandfather, so you have to dress up nice."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「親族会議は遊びじゃないのよ。お祖父さまにお会いするんだから、ちゃんとしたお洋服じゃないと駄目。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「親族会議は遊びじゃないのよ。お祖父さまにお会いするんだから、ちゃんとしたお洋服じゃないと駄目」
Russian (RU): "Семейное собрание не для игр. Мы собираемся встретиться с дедушкой, поэтому ты должна быть в западной одежде."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "A conferência familiar não é para brincar. Vamos ver o vovô, então você precisa se vestir bem."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「親族會議可不是去玩。是要和爺爺見面的，所以必須要穿像樣的洋服才行。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「亲族会议可不是去玩。是要和爷爷见面的，所以必须要穿像样的洋服才行。」
Italian (IT): "Non andiamo alla riunione di famiglia per giocare. Stiamo andando a trovare il nonno, quindi devi vestirti come si deve in stile occidentale."
Turkish (TR): "Aile konferansı eğlenmek için değil. Büyükbabayla görüşeceğiz, o yüzden güzel giyinmen gerekiyor."

Umineko Project (UP): While it wasn't completely full inside the train, there were enough people here that almost all of the seats were occupied.
Steam (ST): While it wasn't completely full inside the train, it was really packed, with almost all the seats occupied by passengers.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): While it wasn't completely full inside the train, it was really packed, with almost all of the seats occupied by passengers.
PC Japanese (JP): 満員とは行かないまでも、車内は座席ほとんどが乗客で埋まる程度には大勢いた。
Russian (RU): Хотя поезд и не выглядел полным, на самом деле он был битком забит, почти все места занимали пассажиры.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O trem não chegava a estar completamente lotado, mas dentro dele haviam pessoas o suficiente para ocupar quase todos os assentos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然還不至於說是擠滿了人，但車內的座位基本上全被乘客坐滿了，人數不少。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然还不至于说是挤满了人，但车内的座位基本上全被乘客坐满了，人数不少。
Italian (IT): Sebbene il treno non fosse completamente pieno, era affollato al punto che quasi tutti i sedili erano occupati da passeggeri.
Turkish (TR): Trenin içi tamamen dolu olmasa da, neredeyse tüm koltukların dolu olmasına yetecek kadar insan vardı.

Umineko Project (UP): Among them, Maria was making a fuss, kicking her feet back and forth in her seat, while Rosa scowled at her.
Steam (ST): Maria was making a fuss among them, stomping her feet on the seat while Rosa scowled at her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Among them, Maria was making a fuss, stomping her feet on the seat while Rosa scowled at her.
PC Japanese (JP): そんな中、座席で足をばたばたさせながらわがままを騒ぐ真里亞に、楼座は顔をしかめている。
Russian (RU): И вот среди них Мария подняла шум, топая ногами на месте, в то время как Роза сердито смотрела на неё.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Entre elas, Maria estava fazendo um alvoroço, chutando seus pés para frente e para trás, enquanto Rosa franzia a testa para ela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 身處在這麼多人之中，真里亞卻還在座位上亂蹬著雙腳，吵得很是大聲。樓座為此皺起了眉頭。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 身处在这么多人之中，真里亚却还在座位上乱蹬着双脚，吵得很是大声。楼座为此皱起了眉头。
Italian (IT): In una circostanza di quel tipo, Rosa stava guardando severamente Maria, la quale si agitava senza curarsi degli altri e sbatteva i piedi sul sedile.
Turkish (TR): Maria oturduğu yerde ayaklarını ileri geri savurarak yaygara koparıyor, Rosa ise kaşlarını çatmış ona bakıyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): Rosa had told her many times in a low voice to stop, but Maria was taking no notice whatsoever.
Steam (ST): Rosa had warned her many times to lower her voice, but Maria hadn't obeyed her at all.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Since earlier, Rosa had warned her many times to lower her voice, but Maria hadn't obeyed her at all.
PC Japanese (JP): さっきから楼座は声を潜めながら何度も注意しているのだが、真里亞は一向に聞き入れなかった。
Russian (RU): Роза уже прежде множество раз просила её вести себя потише, но Мария совсем её не слушала.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa havia dito a ela muitas vezes, em voz baixa para parar, mas não parecia que Maria estava obedecendo ela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然從剛才開始樓座就低聲提醒過她好多次了，但真里亞根本不聽。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然从刚才开始楼座就低声提醒过她好多次了，但真里亚根本不听。
Italian (IT): Rosa l'aveva ammonita per molte volte di abbassare la voce, ma Maria non l'ascoltò affatto...
Turkish (TR): Rosa ona alçak sesle defalarca durmasını söylemişti ama Maria hiç aldırış etmiyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): ...Once Maria gets this way, no matter how much you try to explain the situation or calm her, she doesn't listen.
Steam (ST): ...Once Maria got like this, no matter how much you tried to explain the situation or calm her, she wouldn't listen.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …真里亞は一度頑固になってしまうと、どう説明してもなだめても納得しない。
Russian (RU): ...Стоило Марии начать так себя вести, то сколько бы ей не пытались объяснить ситуацию, она всё равно не стала бы слушать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Uma vez que Maria fica dessa forma, não importa o quanto você tente explicar a situação ou acalmá‐la, ela não escuta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …真里亞一旦固執起來，是無論如何勸說安慰都哄不好的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …真里亚一旦固执起来，是无论如何劝说安慰都哄不好的。
Italian (IT): Una volta che Maria si intestardiva su qualcosa, nessuna spiegazione o moina sarebbe riuscita a convincerla.
Turkish (TR): ...Maria bir kez bu hale geldi mi, durumu ne kadar açıklamaya ya da onu sakinleştirmeye çalışırsanız çalışın, dinlemiyor.

Umineko Project (UP): In the past, Rosa used to pamper Maria and give in to her at times like this.
Steam (ST): Before, Rosa used to pamper Maria and give in to her at times like this.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Before, Rosa used to pamper Maria and give in to her at times like this.
PC Japanese (JP): かつての楼座は、時にそれに妥協し真里亞を甘やかしてしまった。
Russian (RU): Раньше Роза, чтобы побаловать Марию, могла уступить ей в такие минуты.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No passado, Rosa costumava mimar Maria e desistir para ela em horas como esta.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 過去的樓座，曾有幾次順著真里亞的意思做出過妥協。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 过去的楼座，曾有几次顺着真里亚的意思做出过妥协。
Italian (IT): In momenti come questi, Rosa in passato scendeva a compromessi con Maria e l'assecondava.
Turkish (TR): Eskiden Rosa böyle zamanlarda Maria'yı şımartır ve ona istediğini verirdi.

Umineko Project (UP): But, that had probably been the problem.
Steam (ST): But...that had probably been a mistake.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But, that had probably been a bad thing.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、それがきっと悪かったのだろう。
Russian (RU): Но, возможно, что как раз это и вышло боком.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas provavelmente esse havia sido o problema.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 不過，這麼做無疑是錯的吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 不过，这么做无疑是错的吧。
Italian (IT): Tuttavia, fu senz'altro una scelta sbagliata.
Turkish (TR): Ama muhtemelen sorun da buydu.

Umineko Project (UP): Almost certainly, the young Maria had formed the wrong impression that if she kept complaining noisily, her mother would give in, and listen to her.
Steam (ST): Surely, Maria had gained the mistaken impression that throwing a tantrum long enough would make her mother give up and do what Maria said.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When young Maria had complained noisily, her mother had given in, wrongly assuming that Maria had listened to what she had said.
PC Japanese (JP): 幼い真里亞は駄々をこね続ければ母親は折れて自分の言うことを聞いてくれるものだと勘違いしてしまったに違いない。
Russian (RU): Когда маленькая Мария шумно жаловалась, её мать отступала, ошибочно полагая, что Мария выслушала всё, что она сказала.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quase que certamente, a jovem Maria havia formado a impressão errada de que, se ela continuasse fazendo birra, sua mãe desistiria e faria o que ela queria.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 幼小的真里亞一定是把這誤解成了，只要死磨下去母親就會作出讓步，聽從自己的要求。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 幼小的真里亚一定是把这误解成了，只要死磨下去母亲就会作出让步，听从自己的要求。
Italian (IT): La piccola Maria doveva aver avuto l'errata impressione che, se avesse continuato a fare i capricci, sua madre avrebbe ceduto per poi acconsentire.
Turkish (TR): Neredeyse kesin olarak, küçük Maria gürültülü bir şekilde söylenmeye devam ederse annesinin pes edeceği ve onu dinleyeceği gibi yanlış bir izlenime kapılmıştı.

Umineko Project (UP): That error had been brought to Rosa's attention through an educational book, and since then, she had hardened her heart so as not to pamper her beloved daughter...
Steam (ST): Rosa had realized that error with the help of an educational book, and since then, she'd hardened the part of her heart that wanted to pamper her beloved daughter...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa had realized that error with the help of an educational book, and since then, she had turned the part of her heart that wanted to pamper her beloved daughter into a demon...
PC Japanese (JP): その過ちを教育書で気付かされた楼座は以来、愛娘を甘やかさないよう心を鬼にしているのだが…。
Russian (RU): Роза поняла, что допустила ошибку, при помощи учебного пособия, и с тех пор превратила ту часть своего сердца, которое всегда хотело, чтобы она баловала свою дочь, в демона...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa percebeu esse erro com a ajuda de um livro educacional e, desde então, ela endureceu seu coração para não mimar mais sua amada filha...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 自從樓座在教育書上意識到了自己的過失之後，她就使自己變成了不會再去嬌慣愛女的鐵石心腸…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 自从楼座在教育书上意识到了自己的过失之后，她就使自己变成了不会再去娇惯爱女的铁石心肠…。
Italian (IT): Dopo che Rosa si rese conto dell'errore con l'aiuto di un libro educativo, indurì il suo cuore, per non viziare più la sua amata figlia...
Turkish (TR): Bir eğitim kitabı aracılığıyla bu hata Rosa'nın dikkatini çekmişti ve o zamandan beri sevgili kızını şımartmamak için kalbini katılaştırmıştı...

Umineko Project (UP): But Rosa could manage less and less mutual understanding with Maria, and it had become more and more common that she felt discouraged by her own powerlessness...
Steam (ST): Her mutual understanding with Maria began to grow weaker and weaker, and she began to get discouraged by her own powerlessness more and more often...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But Rosa managed to get less and less of a mutual understanding with Maria, and started to be discouraged by her own powerlessness little by little...
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞との意思の疎通はますますに図れなくなり、楼座は自分の無力さに落胆することが少なくなくなっていた…。
Russian (RU): Но Роза начинала находить всё меньше и меньше взаимопонимания с Марией, и в итоге её понемногу начала смущать собственная беспомощность...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Porém, Rosa conseguia administrar menos e menos seu entendimento mútuo com Maria, e havia ficado muito e muito mais comum que ela se sentisse desencorajada por sua própria impotência...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然而這樣一來，得以與真里亞相互溝通理解的機會便越來越難以找到，而樓座為自己的無力而感到沮喪的次數，也越來越多了…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然而这样一来，得以与真里亚相互沟通理解的机会便越来越难以找到，而楼座为自己的无力而感到沮丧的次数，也越来越多了…。
Italian (IT): Man mano che la comunicazione con Maria diveniva sempre più difficile, Rosa diveniva sempre più scoraggiata dalla sua stessa impotenza...
Turkish (TR): Ancak Rosa, Maria'yla gittikçe daha az anlaşabilmeye başlamıştı ve kendi çaresizliği yüzünden cesaretinin kırılması giderek daha sık rastlanan bir durum haline gelmişti...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "Halloween, Halloween!! Trick or treat, uu‐uu‐uu!!"
Steam (ST): "Halloween, Halloween!! If you don't give me sweets, I'll play a prank, uu-uu-uu-!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Halloween, Halloween!! If you don't give me sweets, I'll play a prank, uu-uu-uu-!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「ハロウィンーハロウィンー！！　お菓子をくれなきゃイタズラしちゃうぞー、うーうーうー！！」
Russian (RU): "Хэллоуин, Хэллоуин! Если вы не дадите мне сладкое, то я совершу розыгрыш, у‐у‐у!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Halloween, Halloween!! Se não me der doces, farei travessuras, uu‐uu‐uu‐!!"

Umineko Project (UP): ...The woman looked confused for a moment about what she should say, but then understood that perhaps her actions may have caused trouble for this parent and child, and she accepted the candy back, apologizing...
Steam (ST): ...After getting flustered about what she should say for a few moments, perhaps the old woman realized that her actions may have troubled this parent and child, and she accepted the candy back, apologizing...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...After the old woman grew bewildered about what she should say, perhaps she understood that what she had done may have caused trouble to parent and child, and she accepted the candy back, apologizing...
PC Japanese (JP): …老婦人は、何を口にすればいいか困惑した後、多分自分のしたことはこの親子にとって迷惑だったのだろうと理解し、謝罪を口にして飴玉を受け取った…。
Russian (RU): ...После того, как старушка стала лихорадочно гадать, что бы ей ответить, похоже, она наконец поняла, что своим поступком вызвала конфликт между родителем и ребёнком, и она, извинившись, приняла леденец обратно...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...A mulher pareceu confusa por um momento sobre o que ela deveria dizer, mas então entendeu que talvez suas ações tivessem causado problemas para esta mãe e filha, e aceitou o doce de volta, pedindo desculpa...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …老婦人為不知道該說什麼好而困惑了一會後，理解到自己所做的事大概是給這對母女添了麻煩，便道了聲歉，拿回了糖…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …老妇人为不知道该说什么好而困惑了一会后，理解到自己所做的事大概是给这对母女添了麻烦，便道了声歉，拿回了糖…。
Italian (IT): Non sapendo cosa dire per via dello stupore, l'anziana donna capì che il suo gesto poteva aver causato problemi tra madre e figlia, e scusandosi, prese la caramella...
Turkish (TR): ...Kadın bir an ne diyeceğini şaşırmış gibi görünse de, sonrasında davranışlarının bu anne ve çocuk için sorun yaratmış olabileceğini anladı ve özür dileyerek şekeri geri aldı...

Umineko Project (UP): Then, Rosa finally took notice of her surroundings...
Steam (ST): After that, Rosa finally took notice of her surroundings...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Then, Rosa finally took notice of her surroundings...
PC Japanese (JP): そしてようやく楼座は周りに気付く…。
Russian (RU): Тогда Роза, наконец, обратила внимание на окружающую обстановку...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Então, Rosa finalmente notou seus arredores...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 然後，樓座總算察覺到了周圍的情況…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 然后，楼座总算察觉到了周围的情况…。
Italian (IT): Dopodiché, Rosa cominciò a rendersi conto dell'ambiente in cui si trovavano...
Turkish (TR): Ardından, Rosa nihayet etrafının farkına vardı...

Umineko Project (UP): Her daughter's clothes were all messed up, she was crying and shouting with her nose dripping, and there were many dumbfounded passengers watching them.
Steam (ST): Her daughter's clothes were all messed up, she was crying and shouting with her nose dripping, and there were many dumbfounded passengers watching them.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Her daughter's clothes were all messed up, she was crying and shouting with her nose dripping, and there were many dumbfounded passengers watching them.
PC Japanese (JP): 着衣を乱し、鼻水を零しながらわんわんと泣き叫ぶ娘と、呆然として見守る大勢の乗客たち。
Russian (RU): Одежда её дочери была вся измята, она кричала, плакала и постоянно шмыгала носом, и множество изумленных пассажиров наблюдало за ними.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As roupas de sua filha estavam todas bagunçadas, ela estava chorando com seu nariz escorrendo, e haviam muitos passageiros atônitos assistindo‐as.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 自己的女兒被扯亂了衣服，掛著鼻涕哇哇大哭著，而人數眾多的乘客們則目瞪口呆地旁觀著她們。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 自己的女儿被扯乱了衣服，挂着鼻涕哇哇大哭着，而人数众多的乘客们则目瞪口呆地旁观着她们。
Italian (IT): Sua figlia aveva i vestiti stropicciati, stava piangendo a dirotto e il naso le colava, e vi erano molti passeggeri che guardavano irretiti la scena...
Turkish (TR): Kızının kıyafetleri darmadağınıktı, burnu akarak bağırarak ağlıyordu, ve onları izleyen birçok şaşkına dönmüş yolcu vardı.

Umineko Project (UP): ...Except for the sound of the train running, the railcar was completely silent.
Steam (ST): ...Except for the sound of the train running, the interior was completely silent.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Except for the sound of the train running, the interior was completely silent.
PC Japanese (JP): …列車の走行音を除けば完全に沈黙した車内に。
Russian (RU): ...Кроме стука колес, не было ни единого звука.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Exceto pelo som do trem correndo, o vagão estava completamente silencioso.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …在這除去列車行駛的聲音之外，完全沉默的車廂之中。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …在这除去列车行驶的声音之外，完全沉默的车厢之中。
Italian (IT): Se si escludeva il suono del treno in corsa, al suo interno vi regnava il silenzio.
Turkish (TR): ...Trenin gürültüsü dışında vagon tamamen sessizdi.

Umineko Project (UP): Fortunately, that pitiful silence didn't last more than a short while.{n}...However, in its place came an even more painful atmosphere as everyone whispered.
Steam (ST): Fortunately, that pitiful silence didn't last more than a short while. ...However, it was followed by an even more painful atmosphere as everyone began to whisper.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Fortunately, that pitiful silence didn't last more than a short while....However, it was followed by an even more painful atmosphere as everyone whispered.
PC Japanese (JP): その痛々しい沈黙は、幸いにもしばらくしか続かなかった。…だが代わりに、ヒソヒソというそれまで以上に居辛い空気を生み出すのだった。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): その痛々しい沈黙は、幸いにもしばらくしか続かなかった。{n}…だが代わりに、ヒソヒソというそれまで以上に居辛い空気を生み出すのだった。
Russian (RU): К счастью, эта жалкая тишина длилась недолго.{n}...За ней, тем не менее, последовала ещё более болезненная атмосфера, порождённая возникшим всеобщим перешёптыванием.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Felizmente, aquele silêncio lamentável não durou mais do que um breve momento.{n}...Porém, em seu lugar veio uma atmosfera ainda mais dolorosa enquanto todos sussurravam.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 幸好這令人傷心的沉默只持續了一小段時間。{n}…但是取代它的，卻是比之前還要令人難受的，細聲細語的交頭接耳聲。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 幸好这令人伤心的沉默只持续了一小段时间。{n}…但是取代它的，却是比之前还要令人难受的，细声细语的交头接耳声。
Italian (IT): Fortunatamente, quel silenzio spiacevole durò per un solo istante...{n}Tuttavia, ad esso si susseguì un'atmosfera di bisbigli ancor più disagiante.
Turkish (TR): Neyse ki, bu acınası sessizlik fazla uzun sürmedi.{n}...Ancak, bunun yerine herkesin fısıldaştığı daha da acı verici bir atmosfer meydana geldi.

Umineko Project (UP): Maria shouted, cried, kicked and stomped her feet as usual, paying no heed to the people sitting around her.
Steam (ST): Maria shouted, cried, kicked and stomped her feet as usual, paying no heed to the people sitting around her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maria shouted, cried, kicked and stomped her feet as usual, paying no heed to the people sitting around her.
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞は、両隣に座っている人たちなどお構いなしに、わーわーと叫び、相変わらず足をじたばたさせている。
Russian (RU): Мария кричала и топтала ногами, как обычно не обращая внимания на людей, сидящих вокруг неё.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Maria gritava, chorava, esperneava e batia seus pés como de costume, sem prestar atenção às pessoas sentadas ao redor dela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真里亞完全不顧坐在兩旁的乘客，哇哇大叫著，仍在雙腳亂蹬。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 真里亚完全不顾坐在两旁的乘客，哇哇大叫着，仍在双脚乱蹬。
Italian (IT): Maria urlava e scalciava come prima, non curandosi delle persone sedute accanto a lei...
Turkish (TR): Maria her zamanki gibi çevresinde oturan insanlara aldırmadan bağırıyor, ağlıyor ve ayaklarını yere vururak tepiniyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): ...Impulsively, Rosa tried to slap her again, but she noticed the cold eyes of the people in the train, and couldn't do that anymore.
Steam (ST): ...Impulsively, Rosa tried to slap her again, but she noticed the cold eyes of the people in the train...and couldn't.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …それを再び衝動的に平手で打とうとするが、車内の人々の白い目に気付いてしまった楼座には、もうそれをすることはできなかった。
Russian (RU): ...Розе вновь импульсивно захотелось ударить её, но, заметив холодные глаза людей в поезде, она не смогла это сделать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Impulsivamente, Rosa mais uma vez tentou esbofeteá‐la, mas percebeu os olhares frios das pessoas no trem, e precisou se conter.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …樓座雖然又一次衝動得涌上了扇她耳光的念頭，但注意到了車廂內人們白眼的她，已經無法再把這一巴掌打下去了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …楼座虽然又一次冲动得涌上了扇她耳光的念头，但注意到了车厢内人们白眼的她，已经无法再把这一巴掌打下去了。
Italian (IT): Rosa provò impulsivamente a darle un altro schiaffo, ma essendosi accorta degli sguardi gelidi delle persone sul treno, era impossibilitata a farlo.
Turkish (TR): ...Düşüncesizce Rosa ona tekrar tokat atmaya teşebbüs etti, ancak trendeki insanların soğuk bakışlarını fark ettiğinden bunu artık yapamazdı.

Umineko Project (UP): When the train stopped, Rosa got off, forcibly pulling Maria by the arm, and almost dragging her along the ground.
Steam (ST): When the train stopped, Rosa forcibly pulled Maria's arm and got off, almost dragging her daughter along.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): When the train stopped, Rosa forcibly pulled Maria's arm and got off, almost dragging her daughter along.
PC Japanese (JP): 電車が停まると、楼座は真里亞の腕を強引に引っ張り、半ば引き摺るようにして降りる。
Russian (RU): Когда поезд остановился, Роза схватила Марию за руку и вышла из поезда, волоча дочь за собой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Quando o trem parou, Rosa saiu, puxando Maria à força pelo braço, arrastando‐a quase que junto ao chão.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 電車一停，樓座就強行拽過真里亞的手，接近於強拉硬拽地把她一起拖下了車。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 电车一停，楼座就强行拽过真里亚的手，接近于强拉硬拽地把她一起拖下了车。
Italian (IT): Fermatosi il treno, Rosa scese e tirò con forza il braccio di Maria, arrivando quasi a trascinarla.
Turkish (TR): Tren durduğunda Rosa indi, Maria'yı neredeyse yerde sürüklercesine zorla kolundan tutup çekiştirdi.

Umineko Project (UP): As usual, Maria didn't stop crying.
Steam (ST): Maria didn't stop crying.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): As usual, Maria didn't stop crying.
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞は相変わらず泣き止まない。
Russian (RU): Мария, как обычно, не прекращала плакать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Como sempre, Maria não parou de chorar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真里亞依舊沒有停止哭泣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 真里亚依旧没有停止哭泣。
Italian (IT): Maria continuava ancora a piangere.
Turkish (TR): Maria her zamanki gibi ağlamayı kesmedi.

Umineko Project (UP): Rosa took her to the end of the platform and hit her cheek again.
Steam (ST): Rosa took her to the end of the platform and hit her cheek again.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa took her to the end of the platform and hit her cheek again.
PC Japanese (JP): それをホームの端に連れて行き、楼座は再びその頬を打った。
Russian (RU): Роза дошла с ней до конца платформы и снова дала ей пощёчину.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa a levou para o fim da plataforma e acertou seu rosto de novo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 把她帶到月台邊緣處後，樓座又給了她一記耳光。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 把她带到月台边缘处后，楼座又给了她一记耳光。
Italian (IT): Rosa la portò fino alla fine del binario, e la colpì di nuovo sulla guancia.
Turkish (TR): Rosa onu peronun sonuna kadar götürdü ve yanağına tekrar vurdu.

Umineko Project (UP): At the moment she was hit, Maria stopped crying for an instant, but before long, she shouted and cried even more than before.
Steam (ST): At the moment she was hit, Maria stopped crying for an instant, but before long, she shouted and cried even more than before.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At the moment she was hit, Maria stopped crying for an instant, but before long, she shouted and cried even more then before.
PC Japanese (JP): 打たれたその瞬間は一瞬泣き止むが、真里亞はすぐにそれまでより大きく泣き叫ぶ。
Russian (RU): После удара Мария на мгновение перестала плакать, но после этого стала кричать и плакать ещё больше, чем прежде.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): No momento que foi atingida, Maria parou de chorar por um instante, mas, pouco depois, ela começou a gritar e chorar ainda mais.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然被打到的那一瞬間，真里亞止住了哭聲，但馬上，她就以比之前更大的聲音哭喊了出來。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然被打到的那一瞬间，真里亚止住了哭声，但马上，她就以比之前更大的声音哭喊了出来。
Italian (IT): Nel momento in cui venne picchiata, Maria smise di piangere per un attimo, ma subito dopo urlò più forte di prima.
Turkish (TR): Kendisine tokat atıldığı anda Maria bir an için ağlamayı kesti ama çok geçmeden eskisinden daha fazla bağırarak ağlamaya başladı.

Umineko Project (UP): Rosa, whose emotions had exploded, grabbed Maria by her collar, and pulled her hair as if to rip it out.
Steam (ST): Overwhelmed with emotion, Rosa grabbed the nape of Maria's neck and dragged her, tugging at her hair.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa, whose emotions had exploded, grabbed the nape of Maria's neck and dragged her, tugging at her hair.
PC Japanese (JP): 感情を弾けさせた楼座は、真里亞の襟首を掴み上げ、その髪の毛を毟るように引っ張った。
Russian (RU): Роза, на пределе своих эмоций, схватила Марию за воротник и поволокла её, зацепляя волосы.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Com suas emoções explodindo, Rosa agarrou Maria pelo colarinho e puxou seu cabelo como se fosse arrancá‐lo.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 情緒爆發的樓座一把拎起真里亞的領口，狠狠地拽起了她的頭髮，恨不得要把它拔下來一樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 情绪爆发的楼座一把拎起真里亚的领口，狠狠地拽起了她的头发，恨不得要把它拔下来一样。
Italian (IT): Sopraffatta dall'emozione, Rosa prese Maria per la nuca, e la tirò per i capelli quasi fino a strapparli.
Turkish (TR): Duygularına hakim olamayan Rosa, Maria'yı yakasından tuttu ve saçlarını kökünden koparacakmış gibi çekti.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "Uu!! Uu‐uu‐uu!! Uu!! Mama, it hurts, Mama, it hurts!! Uu‐uu‐uu!!"
Steam (ST): "Uu-!! Uu-uu-uu-!! Uu-!! Mama, it hurts, Mama, it hurts!! Uu-uu-uu-!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Uu-!! Uu-uu-uu-!! Uu-!! Mama, it hurts, Mama, it hurts!! Uu-uu-uu-!!"
PC Japanese (JP): 「うーッ！！　うーうーうー！！　うー！！　ママ痛い、ママ痛い！！　うーうーうーッ！！」
Russian (RU): "У‐у! У‐у‐у! У‐у! Мама, больно, мама, больно! У‐у‐у!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Uu!! Uu‐uu‐uu!! Uu!! Mamãe, isso dói, mamãe, isso dói!! Uu‐uu‐uu!!"
Italian (IT): "Uuh!! Uuh, uuh, uuh!! Uuh!! Mamma, fa male, mamma, fa male!! Uuh, uuh, uuh!!"
Turkish (TR): "Uu!! Uu-uu-uu!! Uu!! Anne, acıyor, anne, acıyor!! Uu-uu-uu!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Umineko Project (UP): "Can't you hear me, I'm telling you to shut up!! That "uu‐uu" of yours! I'm telling you to STOP it!!"
Steam (ST): "Can't you hear me, I'm telling you to shut up!! That uu-uu- of yours! I told you to stop!!
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "That's why I'm telling you to shut up!! That uu-uu- of yours! I'm telling you to stop that!!
PC Japanese (JP): 「だからうるさいって言ってんのよッ！！　そのうーうーをッ！　やめなさいってッ、言ってるでしょおッ！！
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「だからうるさいって言ってんのよッ！！　そのうーうーをッ！　やめなさいってッ、言ってるでしょおッ！！」
Russian (RU): "Вот почему я говорю тебе закрыть рот! Это твое 'у‐у'! Прекрати так делать!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Eu já não disse para calar a boca?! Esse seu "uu‐uu"! Estou dizendo para parar com isso!!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「所以我才說你好吵！！這嗚——嗚——！我不是都講了不准再說了嗎！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「所以我才说你好吵！！这呜——呜——！我不是都讲了不准再说了吗！！」
Italian (IT): "Non ti avevo detto di piantarla?!! Tu e quel tuo ‘uuh, uuh’! Ti ho detto di smetterla!!"
Turkish (TR): "Beni duymuyor musun, sana çeneni kapamanı söylüyorum!! Senin "uu-uu" sesin! Sana KESMENİ söylüyorum!!"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Umineko Project (UP): "That's the reason you can't make friends in class, don't you get it?! Get ahold of yourself!! Why are you always a kindergartner inside your head?!! Why can't you do what Mama says?!! Why!! WHY!!!"
Steam (ST): That's the reason you can't make friends in class, right?! Get ahold of yourself!! Why are you still a kindergartner inside your head?!! Why can't you do what Mama says?!! Why?!! Why?!!!"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): That's the reason you can't make friends in class, right?! Get a hold of yourself!! Why are you always a kindergartner inside your head?!! Why can't you obey what Mama says?!! Why!! Why!!!"
PC Japanese (JP): そんなだからクラスにお友達ができないんでしょ？！　もっとしっかりしてよ！！　何であんたはいつまでも頭の中が幼稚園なのよッ！！　どうしてママの言うことが聞けないの！！　どうしてッ！！　どうして！！！」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「そんなだからクラスにお友達ができないんでしょ？！　もっとしっかりしてよ！！　何であんたはいつまでも頭の中が幼稚園なのよッ！！　どうしてママの言うことが聞けないの！！　どうしてッ！！　どうして！！！」
Russian (RU): "Это и есть причина, по которой ты не можешь найти друзей в классе, верно? Очнись ты! Что у тебя вечно за детский сад в голове?!! Почему ты не можешь послушаться того, что говорит мама?!! Почему?! Почему?!!"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Esse é o motivo pelo qual você não consegue fazer amigos na sua classe, sabia?! Recomponha‐se!! Por que você é sempre uma aluna do jardim de infância dentro da sua cabeça?! Por que você não pode fazer o que a mamãe diz?! Por quê?!{n}{b:Por quê}?!"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「都是因為這樣你才會在班上交不到朋友！！給我懂事一點！！為什麼你腦袋裡面永遠都停留在幼兒園啊！！為什麼不肯聽媽媽的話！！為什麼！！為什麼！！！」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「都是因为这样你才会在班上交不到朋友！！给我懂事一点！！为什么你脑袋里面永远都停留在幼儿园啊！！为什么不肯听妈妈的话！！为什么！！为什么！！！」
Italian (IT): "È per questo che non riesci a farti amici in classe, vero?! Datti un contegno!! Perché nella tua testa credi di stare sempre all'asilo?!! Perché non ascolti mai quello che dice la mamma?!! Perché?!! Perché?!!!"
Turkish (TR): "Anlamıyor musun, işte bu yüzden sınıfta arkadaş edinemiyorsun!! Kendine gel!! Neden kafanın içinde hep bir anaokulu çocuğu gibisin?!! Neden sadece annenin dediğini yapamıyorsun?!! Neden!! NEDEN!!!"

Umineko Project (UP): Along with those severe words, Rosa hit Maria's head over and over again.{n}The more Maria cried and shouted, the more Rosa hit her.{n}And the more Maria was hit, the more intensely she cried and shouted...
Steam (ST): With those severe words, Rosa hit Maria's cheek over and over again. The more Maria cried and shouted, the more Rosa hit her. And the more Maria was hit, the more intensely she cried and shouted...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Along with those severe words, Rosa hit Maria's cheek over and over again. The more Maria cried and shouted, the more Rosa hit her. And the more Maria was hit, the more intensely she cried and shouted...
PC Japanese (JP): 厳しい言葉と共に、楼座は何度も何度も頭を打つ。真里亞が泣き叫べば泣き叫ぶほどに打つ。そして真里亞も打たれれば打たれるほどに激しく泣き叫ぶ…。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 厳しい言葉と共に、楼座は何度も何度も頭を打つ。{n}真里亞が泣き叫べば泣き叫ぶほどに打つ。{n}そして真里亞も打たれれば打たれるほどに激しく泣き叫ぶ…。
Russian (RU): Выкрикивая эти жёсткие слова, Роза продолжала хлестать Марию по щеке снова и снова.{n}Чем больше Мария плакала и кричала, тем больше Роза била её.{n}И чем больше она била Марию, тем сильнее она кричала и плакала...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Junto com essas palavras severas, Rosa acertou a cabeça de Maria de novo e de novo.{n}Quanto mais Maria chorava e gritava, mais Rosa batia nela.{n}E quanto mais Maria era atingida, mais intensamente ela chorava e gritava...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 伴隨著嚴苛的話語，樓座一次又一次地痛打著她的腦袋。{n}真里亞越是哭喊，樓座就打得越狠。{n}而被打得越痛，真里亞也就哭喊得越是淒慘…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 伴随着严苛的话语，楼座一次又一次地痛打着她的脑袋。{n}真里亚越是哭喊，楼座就打得越狠。{n}而被打得越痛，真里亚也就哭喊得越是凄惨…。
Italian (IT): Mentre parlava senza alcuna clemenza, Rosa la percosse in testa più e più volte.{n}Più Maria urlava e piangeva, tanto più Rosa la colpiva.{n}E più Maria veniva colpita, tanto più intensamente piangeva e urlava...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Umineko Project (UP): "WHY can't you just STOP that whining?!! It's because you're like this that you can't make friends!! It's because you're like this that Papa never comes back from his business trip!! It's because you're like this that I...!!"

Umineko Project (UP): The one who timidly called to her was the station attendant.{n}Rosa glared at him with a look that said "don't cut into the problems of a mother and child, stranger".
Steam (ST): The one who timidly called to her was the station attendant. Rosa glared at the attendant with a look that said "don't butt into the problems of a mother and child, stranger".
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The one who timidly called to her was the station attendant. Rosa glared at him with a look that said 'don't cut into the problems of a mother and a child, stranger'.
PC Japanese (JP): 恐る恐る声を掛けてきたのは駅員だった。楼座は、親子の問題に他人が口を挟むなという形相で睨みつける。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 恐る恐る声を掛けてきたのは駅員だった。{n}楼座は、親子の問題に他人が口を挟むなという形相で睨みつける。
Russian (RU): Тем, кто робко обратился к ней, был дежурный станции.{n}Роза устремила на него взгляд, говорящий "не вмешивайся в проблемы матери и ребёнка, незнакомец".
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Aquele que timidamente a chamou era o atendente da estação.{n}Rosa o encarou com um olhar que dizia "não se meta nos problemas de uma mãe e sua filha, seu estranho!".
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 戰戰兢兢前來搭話的是站務員。{n}樓座以母女問題不容他人插嘴的恐怖神色怒視著他。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 战战兢兢前来搭话的是站务员。{n}楼座以母女问题不容他人插嘴的恐怖神色怒视着他。
Italian (IT): A chiamarla timidamente era stato un addetto della stazione.{n}Rosa gli lanciò un'occhiata, con cui gli disse di non immischiarsi da estraneo nei problemi tra una madre e sua figlia.
Turkish (TR): Ona ürkekçe seslenen kişi istasyon görevlisiydi.{n}Rosa ona "bir anne ve çocuğun sorunlarına burnunu sokma" diyen bir bakış fırlattı.

Umineko Project (UP): The station attendant surely hadn't wanted to talk to her.{n}However, Rosa had been yelling on the platform for a much longer time than she had imagined.
Steam (ST): Of course, the attendant surely hadn't wanted to get involved either. However, Rosa had been yelling on the platform for a much longer time than she had imagined.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The station attendant surely hadn't wanted to talk to her. However, Rosa had been yelling on the platform for a much longer time than she had imagined.
PC Japanese (JP): 駅員とて話しかけたくなかったに違いない。しかし、楼座が思っているより遥かに長い時間をこのホームで怒鳴り続けていた。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 駅員とて話しかけたくなかったに違いない。{n}しかし、楼座が思っているより遥かに長い時間をこのホームで怒鳴り続けていた。
Russian (RU): Дежурный станции, естественно, не горел желанием с ней разговаривать.{n}Однако Роза кричала на платформе гораздо больше времени, чем она представляла.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): O atendente da estação certamente não queria falar com ela.{n}Porém, Rosa esteve berrando na plataforma por muito mais tempo do que ela tinha imaginado.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 站務員也肯定是不想來搭話的。{n}可是，樓座已遠比她自己想像得要久得多地，在這月台上怒吼了很長時間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 站务员也肯定是不想来搭话的。{n}可是，楼座已远比她自己想象得要久得多地，在这月台上怒吼了很长时间。
Italian (IT): L'addetto di certo non voleva parlare con lei.{n}Tuttavia, Rosa stava gridando sul binario molto più a lungo di quanto lei avesse immaginato...
Turkish (TR): İstasyon görevlisi kesinlikle onunla konuşmak istememişti.{n}Ancak Rosa peronda tahmin ettiğinden çok daha uzun bir süredir bağırıp duruyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): ...Her emotional scolding had caused the passengers on the platform to advise the station attendant that it would be a good idea to speak to her.
Steam (ST): ...Her emotional scolding had led the passengers on the platform to advise the attendant to call out to her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Her emotional scolding had caused the passengers on the platform to advise the station attendant that it would be a good idea to call out to her.
PC Japanese (JP): …そして、その感情的な叱り方に、ホームの乗客たちが駅員に声を掛けた方がいいのではないかと忠告したのである。
Russian (RU): ...Её эмоциональная выволочка вынудила пассажиров на платформе сообщить дежурному станции, что было бы неплохо обратиться к ней.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Sua repreensão emocional havia feito os passageiros na plataforma avisarem ao atendente da estação que seria uma boa ideia falar com ela.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …而這感情用事的訓斥方式，也使得月台上的乘客們找到了站務員，建議他來勸說一下。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …而这感情用事的训斥方式，也使得月台上的乘客们找到了站务员，建议他来劝说一下。
Italian (IT): E a causa dei suoi rimproveri esagitati, i passeggeri sul binario avvertirono l'addetto che sarebbe stato meglio richiamarla.
Turkish (TR): ...Onun duygu dolu azarlamaları, perondaki yolcuların istasyon görevlisine onunla konuşmanın iyi bir fikir olacağını söylemelerine neden olmuştu.

Umineko Project (UP): Rosa yelled at the station attendant that they would get on the next train and not to bother them anymore.
Steam (ST): Rosa yelled at the attendant, saying not to worry anymore, since they'd be getting on the next train.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Rosa yelled at the station attendant not to worry anymore, since they would get on the next train.
PC Japanese (JP): 楼座は、次の電車に乗るからもう構うなと駅員に怒鳴りつける。
Russian (RU): Роза крикнула дежурному станции больше не волноваться, поскольку они собираются уехать следующим поездом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Rosa gritou com o atendente da estação, dizendo que elas pegariam o próximo trem e não iriam mais incomodar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 樓座向站務員怒吼了一聲：“我們會坐下一班電車走的，所以別來管閑事了”。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 楼座向站务员怒吼了一声：“我们会坐下一班电车走的，所以别来管闲事了”。
Italian (IT): Rosa gli urlò di non preoccuparsi più, dato che avrebbero preso il treno successivo...
Turkish (TR): Rosa istasyon görevlisine bağırarak bir sonraki trene bineceklerini ve onları daha fazla rahatsız etmemesini söyledi.

Umineko Project (UP): ...And then, finally, or maybe we should say, for the second time, ...she noticed the passengers on the platform staring at her from the distance.
Steam (ST): ...And then, finally...or rather, for the second time, ...she noticed the passengers on the platform staring at her from a distance.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …そしてようやく、あるいは再びというべきか、…ホームの乗客たちが遠くからジロジロと見ているのに気付くのだった。
Russian (RU): ...И теперь, наконец, или, возможно, следует сказать, снова, она заметила пассажиров на платформе, издали уставившихся на неё.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...E então, finalmente, ou talvez devêssemos dizer, pela segunda vez, ...ela notou os passageiros na plataforma a encarando à distância.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …然後她總算，又或者該說是再一次吧，…注意到了月台上的乘客們從遠處投來的異樣目光。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …然后她总算，又或者该说是再一次吧，…注意到了月台上的乘客们从远处投来的异样目光。
Italian (IT): E alla fine, o sarebbe meglio dire, per la seconda volta... notò in lontananza i passeggeri sul binario che la squadravano...
Turkish (TR): ...Ve sonra, nihayet, ya da belki de ikinci kez demeliyiz, ...Rosa perondaki yolcuların uzaktan kendisine baktıklarını fark etti.

Umineko Project (UP): ......Rosa sweated slightly; she felt the wind chill the sweat, tormenting her.
Steam (ST): ...Rosa sweat slightly and felt a breeze make her sweat go cold, tormenting her.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ......Rosa sweat slightly and felt the wind torturing her, making her sweat cold.
PC Japanese (JP): ……楼座は自分がうっすらと汗をかき、風がそれを冷たくして苛むのを感じた。
Russian (RU): ......Роза немного вспотела и ощутила, как ветер пытает её, охлаждая пот.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ......Rosa estava ligeiramente suada e sentiu o vento esfriar seu suor, atormentando‐a.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……樓座感覺到自己微微出了些汗，風吹在汗上冷冰冰的，就好像是在責備著自己。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……楼座感觉到自己微微出了些汗，风吹在汗上冷冰冰的，就好像是在责备着自己。
Italian (IT): Il vento rendeva gelido le gocce di sudore di Rosa, tormentandola...
Turkish (TR): ......Rosa hafifçe terledi; rüzgârın terini soğuttuğunu ve ona eziyet etmekte olduğunu hissetti.

Umineko Project (UP): Maria was still crying, shielding her own head.{n}......No—unless this beating stopped, she would probably keep crying forever.
Steam (ST): Maria still kept on crying, shielding her own head. ...Of course, if this beating continued, she'd probably keep crying indefinitely.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Maria still kept on crying, shielding her own head.......No, ...if this beating continues, she will probably keep crying forever.
PC Japanese (JP): 真里亞は自分の頭を庇いながら、まだ泣き続けている。……いや、…叩き続ける限り、ずっと泣き続けるだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 真里亞は自分の頭を庇いながら、まだ泣き続けている。{n}……いや、…叩き続ける限り、ずっと泣き続けるだろう。
Russian (RU): Мария всё ещё продолжала плакать, прикрывая свою голову.{n}......Нет...если это избиение продолжится, она, возможно, так и будет вечно плакать.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Maria ainda estava chorando, protegendo sua própria cabeça.{n}......Não — a menos que esta palmatória parasse, ela provavelmente continuaria chorando para sempre.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 真里亞則用手保護著自己的腦袋，還在繼續哭泣。{n}……不，…該說只要還繼續打她，她就會一直哭下去吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 真里亚则用手保护着自己的脑袋，还在继续哭泣。{n}……不，…该说只要还继续打她，她就会一直哭下去吧。
Italian (IT): Maria continuava ancora a piangere, proteggendosi la testa...{n}Dopotutto... probabilmente, finché non avrebbe smesso di picchiarla, avrebbe continuato a piangere per tutto il tempo.
Turkish (TR): Maria hâlâ ağlıyor, başını korumaya çalışıyordu.{n}......Hayır—bu dayak durmadığı sürece, muhtemelen sonsuza dek ağlamaya devam edecekti.

Chinese Simplified (CN): 随着楼座脑中的那股恶烧退去，…她终于发现，自己又一次把灵魂让给了不好的东西。

PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 本当は途中下車の駅で道草を食っているような時間はない。{n}飛行機を逃してしまえば、半日は遅れてしまうことになる。
Russian (RU): Говоря по правде, у них не было времени впустую слоняться около остановки станции.{n}Если они опоздают на самолёт, то на полдня отстанут от запланированного графика.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): A verdade era que elas não tinham tempo a perder vagando por uma estação de escala. Se elas perdessem o avião, ficariam com um dia de atraso no cronograma.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 說真的，根本沒有時間在半路下車的車站閑晃。{n}要是錯過了飛機，就會晚到半天。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 说真的，根本没有时间在半路下车的车站闲晃。{n}要是错过了飞机，就会晚到半天。
Italian (IT): In verità, non avevano tempo da perdere in una stazione di scalo.{n}Se avessero perso l'aereo, avrebbero fatto ritardo di mezza giornata.
Turkish (TR): Aslına bakılırsa, bir mola istasyonunda oyalanarak kaybedecek hiç zamanları yoktu.{n}Eğer uçağı kaçırırlarsa, programlarının yarım gün gerisine düşeceklerdi.

Umineko Project (UP): She should have left home with more time to spare, but she had ended up leaving late after spending too long choosing Maria's clothes.
Steam (ST): She should have left home with more time to spare, but she'd ended up leaving late after choosing Maria's clothes.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She should have left home with more time to spare, but she had ended up leaving late after choosing Maria's clothes.
PC Japanese (JP): もっと余裕を持って家を出ればよかったのだが、真里亞に着せる服をあれこれ選んでいる内に遅くなってしまった。
Russian (RU): Она должна была отправиться домой с достаточным временем в запасе, но в итоге задержалась, так как пришлось подобрать одежду для Марии.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Elas deviam ter saído de casa com mais tempo de sobra, mas acabaram saindo tarde depois de passar tempo demais escolhendo as roupas de Maria.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 若是能多騰出點時間，再早點從家裡出來就好了，但在挑真里亞該穿哪件衣服時，選來選去浪費了不少時間。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 若是能多腾出点时间，再早点从家里出来就好了，但在挑真里亚该穿哪件衣服时，选来选去浪费了不少时间。
Italian (IT): Sarebbero dovute partire da casa con più anticipo, ma nel scegliere quali vestiti far portare a Maria finirono per fare tardi...
Turkish (TR): Evden daha erken çıkmaları gerekirdi ama Maria'nın kıyafetlerini seçmek için çok uzun zaman harcadıklarından geç kalmışlardı.

Umineko Project (UP): ...Because of that, Rosa had been a bit impatient since the morning.
Steam (ST): ...Because of that, Rosa had been a bit impatient since the morning.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): …そのせいで、今朝から楼座は少し焦り気味だったのだ。
Russian (RU): ...Из‐за этого Роза с самого утра была как на иголках.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Por causa disso, Rosa esteve um tanto impaciente desde manhã.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …也正是出於這個原因，從今早開始樓座的心情就稍微有點焦躁。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …也正是出于这个原因，从今早开始楼座的心情就稍微有点焦躁。
Italian (IT): Era per questa ragione che Rosa era leggermente irrequieta sin dal mattino.
Turkish (TR): ...Bu nedenle Rosa sabahtan beri pek sabırlı değildi.

Umineko Project (UP): She looked at the clock. ...They should be getting on the next train immediately.
Steam (ST): She looked at the clock. ...They had to get on the next train immediately.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): She looked at the clock. ...They had to get on the next train immediately.
PC Japanese (JP): 時計を見る。…すぐにでも次の電車に乗るべきなのだ。
Russian (RU): Она посмотрела на часы. ...Им следовало немедленно уезжать следующим поездом.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ela olhou para o relógio. ...Elas deveriam pegar o próximo trem imediatamente.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 看了下鐘。…已經到馬上該去乘下一班電車的時候了。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 看了下钟。…已经到马上该去乘下一班电车的时候了。
Italian (IT): Guardò l'orologio... Dovevano prendere subito il prossimo treno.
Turkish (TR): Saatine baktı. ...Derhal bir sonraki trene binmeleri gerekiyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): But her daughter had firmly joined hands with her to go buy the sweet together, and that hand was warm.
Steam (ST): But, her daughter firmly joined hands with her to go buy the sweet with her mother, and that hand was warm.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): But, her daughter firmly joined hands with her to go buy the sweet with her mother, and that hand was warm.
PC Japanese (JP): でも、母と一緒にお菓子を買いに行こうと手を固く結ぶ、娘の手は温かかった。
Russian (RU): Но её дочь решительно взяла её за руку, чтобы пойти и купить конфету со своей матерью, и эта рука была тёплой.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Mas Maria havia segurado firmemente a sua mão para irem comprar o doce juntas, e a mão de sua filha estava aquecida.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 可樓座注意到，女兒為了想和自己一起去買零食而緊緊牽上的手，卻是如此地溫暖。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 可楼座注意到，女儿为了想和自己一起去买零食而紧紧牵上的手，却是如此地温暖。
Italian (IT): Ma la mano di sua figlia, che stringeva forte quella della madre per andare a comprare dei dolcetti insieme a lei, era pregna di calore...
Turkish (TR): Ama kızıyla birlikte şekerleme almaya gitmek için sıkıca el ele tutuşmuşlardı ve o el sıcacıktı.

Umineko Project (UP): ...To Rosa right now, it was more important to regrow her bonds with Maria.
Steam (ST): ...To Rosa as she was now, it was more important to renew her bonds with Maria.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...To Rosa as she was now, it was more important to regrow her bonds with Maria.
PC Japanese (JP): …今の楼座にとって、真里亞との絆を取り戻すことの方が大事だった。
Russian (RU): ...Прямо сейчас для Розы гораздо важнее было вновь укрепить свою связь с Марией.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Naquele momento, o mais importante para Rosa era reconstruir seus laços com Maria.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …對現在的樓座來說，挽回和真里亞間的牽絆才是最重要的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …对现在的楼座来说，挽回和真里亚间的牵绊才是最重要的。
Italian (IT): Per Rosa, in quel momento ricostruire il suo rapporto con Maria era più importante...
Turkish (TR): ...Rosa için şu anda Maria ile bağlarını onarmak daha önemliydi.

Umineko Project (UP): ...Maria was not only Rosa's beloved daughter, ...she was everything Rosa had.
Steam (ST): ...To her, Maria was not only a beloved daughter, ...she was everything Rosa had.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...To her, Maria was not only a beloved daughter, ...she was everything Rosa had.
PC Japanese (JP): ……真里亞は自分にとって、愛しい娘であるだけでなく、…今の自分の全てなのだ。
Russian (RU): ...Для неё Мария была не только любимой дочерью. Для Розы она была всем.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Maria não era apenas a filha amada de Rosa, ...ela era tudo que Rosa tinha.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): ……真里亞對自己而言，不僅僅是摯愛的女兒，…更是如今自己的一切。
Chinese Simplified (CN): ……真里亚对自己而言，不仅仅是挚爱的女儿，…更是如今自己的一切。
Italian (IT): Per lei Maria non era solamente la sua dolce bambina... era tutto quello che adesso aveva.
Turkish (TR): ...Maria sadece Rosa'nın sevgili kızı değil, ...Rosa'nın sahip olduğu her şeydi.

Umineko Project (UP): Fortunately, she could see that there was a big supermarket right in front of the station.{n}...Maybe she wouldn't be able to find a sweet exactly like that one, but Maria would probably accept something similar.
Steam (ST): Fortunately, they could see a big supermarket right in front of the station. ...They might not be able to find exactly the same sweet, but Maria would probably be happy with a similar one.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Fortunately, they could see that there was a big supermarket right in front of the station....Maybe they wouldn't be able to find a sweet exactly like that one, but Maria would probably accept a similar one.
PC Japanese (JP): 幸い、駅前すぐに大きなスーパーがあるのが見えた。…あれとまったく同じお菓子を見つけることはできないかもしれないが、似たようなもので納得してくれるだろう。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 幸い、駅前すぐに大きなスーパーがあるのが見えた。{n}…あれとまったく同じお菓子を見つけることはできないかもしれないが、似たようなもので納得してくれるだろう。
Russian (RU): К счастью, они увидели большой супермаркет прямо напротив станции.{n}...Быть может, они и не смогут найти точно такую же конфету, но возможно, Мария выберет себе что‐нибудь похожее.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Felizmente, Rosa avistou um grande supermercado em frente à estação.{n}...Talvez ela não fosse capaz de encontrar um doce exatamente como aquele, mas Maria provavelmente aceitaria algo similar.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 幸好，車站跟前就有個大型超市。{n}…雖然或許並不能找到和之前那個一模一樣的糖，但哪怕是和它差不多的，女兒應該也會接受吧。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 幸好，车站跟前就有个大型超市。{n}…虽然或许并不能找到和之前那个一模一样的糖，但哪怕是和它差不多的，女儿应该也会接受吧。
Italian (IT): Per fortuna, videro che proprio accanto alla stazione c'era un grande supermercato... Forse non sarebbero riuscite a trovare un dolcetto esattamente identico, ma probabilmente sarebbe andato bene anche uno simile.
Turkish (TR): Neyse ki istasyonun hemen ön tarafında büyük bir süpermarket olduğunu gördü.{n}...Belki tam olarak aynı şekerlemeden bulamayacaktı ama Maria muhtemelen benzer olan bir şeyi de kabul ederdi.

Umineko Project (UP): Besides, Rosa also couldn't show up with a face swelled from crying.{n}She would have to fix her makeup.
Steam (ST): Besides, Rosa couldn't show up with a face swelled from crying. She must fix her make-up.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Besides, Rosa also couldn't show up with a face swelled from crying. She must fix her make-up.
PC Japanese (JP): それに自分もこんな泣きはらした顔では出られない。化粧を直さなくては。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): それに自分もこんな泣きはらした顔では出られない。{n}化粧を直さなくては。
Russian (RU): Кроме того, Роза не могла показаться с таким лицом, распухшим от слёз.{n}Ей нужно было поправить макияж.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Além do mais, Rosa também não podia aparecer com um rosto inchado por causa de seu choro. Ela teria que retocar sua maquiagem.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 況且自己也不能以這副哭腫了臉的樣子去見人。{n}得去重新補個妝才行。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 况且自己也不能以这副哭肿了脸的样子去见人。{n}得去重新补个妆才行。
Italian (IT): Inoltre, Rosa non poteva mostrarsi con un volto rigato dalle lacrime.{n}Doveva aggiustarsi il trucco.
Turkish (TR): Üstelik Rosa da ağlamaktan şişmiş bir yüzle ortalıkta görünemezdi.{n}Makyajını tazelemesi gerekecekti.

Speaker: Ushiromiya Rosa
Umineko Project (UP): "We might not find a marshmallow exactly like that one, ...but I hope we can find a sweet that's similar. ......And let's surprise all your cousins with it."
Steam (ST): "Maybe we won't find a marshmallow exactly like that one, ...but hopefully we can find something like it. ...Let's buy some and surprise all your cousins together."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "Maybe we won't find a marshmallow exactly like that one, ...but it's alright if there's a similar sweet, right? ......With that, let's surprise all your cousins together."
PC Japanese (JP): 「あれとまったく同じマシュマロは見付からないかもしれないけど、…似たようなお菓子があるといいね。……それで、いとこのみんなを一緒に驚かそうね。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「あれとまったく同じマシュマロは見付からないかもしれないけど、…似たようなお菓子があるといいね。……それで、いとこのみんなを一緒に驚かそうね」
Russian (RU): "Может быть, мы и не найдём точно такой же зефир, как и тот... Но ничего страшного, если мы возьмём похожую конфету, верно? ......С ней, давай сразу удивим твоих кузенов и кузину."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Podemos não encontrar um marshmallow exatamente como aquele, ...mas espero que possamos encontrar um doce parecido. ......E vamos surpreender todos os seus primos com ele."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「雖然可能不一定能找得到和之前那個一模一樣的軟糖，…但要是能有個差不多的也不錯呢。……之後我們就一起去讓堂哥堂姐們大吃一驚吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「虽然可能不一定能找得到和之前那个一模一样的软糖，…但要是能有个差不多的也不错呢。……之后我们就一起去让堂哥堂姐们大吃一惊吧。」
Italian (IT): "Forse non troveremo un marshmallow esattamente identico a quello... ma spero vada bene anche uno simile... Usiamolo per sorprendere insieme tutti i cugini."
Turkish (TR): "Tam olarak aynı marşmelovu bulamayabiliriz, ...ama umuyorum ki benzer bir şekerleme bulabiliriz. ......Ve tüm kuzenlerine sürpriz yapalım."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Maria
Umineko Project (UP): "Yeah. ...If it's a sweet I bought together with Mama, anything is fine."
Steam (ST): "Yeah. ...As long as we buy it together, any sweet is fine."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「うん。…ママと一緒に買うお菓子なら、何でもいい。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「うん。…ママと一緒に買うお菓子なら、何でもいい」
Russian (RU): "Да. ...Если я куплю эту конфету вместе с мамой, то всё в порядке."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Sim. ...Se for um doce comprado junto com a mamãe, qualquer coisa está bom."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「嗯。…只要是和媽媽一起買的糖，什麼都行。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「嗯。…只要是和妈妈一起买的糖，什么都行。」
Italian (IT): "Sì... Ogni dolcetto andrà bene, se è comprato assieme alla mamma."
Turkish (TR): "Evet. ...Eğer annemle birlikte aldığım bir tatlıysa, her şey olur."

Umineko Project (UP): The two left the turnstiles of the station in this unknown town.{n}Maria walked across the pedestrian crossing together with her mother, feeling very pleased, as though she was walking in an amusement park.
Steam (ST): They exited through the turnstiles of the station in this unknown town. Maria walked across the pedestrian crossing together with her mother, chuckling to herself, as though she was walking in an amusement park.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): The two left the turnstiles of the station in this unknown town. Maria walked across the pedestrian crossing together with her mother, chuckling to herself, as though she was walking in an amusement park.
PC Japanese (JP): 二人は見知らぬ町の駅で改札を出る。真里亞は、母と渡る横断歩道を、まるで遊園地で歩くようにほくほくしながら歩む。
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 二人は見知らぬ町の駅で改札を出る。{n}真里亞は、母と渡る横断歩道を、まるで遊園地で歩くようにほくほくしながら歩む。
Russian (RU): Так они вышли за турникеты в этом незнакомом городе.{n}Мария вместе с матерью шла по пешеходному переходу, хихикая про себя, словно направлялась в парк аттракционов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): As duas saíram pelos torniquetes da estação daquela cidade desconhecida.{n}Maria caminhou pela faixa de pedestres junto com sua mãe, sentindo‐se muito contente, como se ela estivesse caminhando em um parque de diversões.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 兩人走出了陌生城市車站的剪票口。{n}真里亞和母親一起走過人行橫道時，那難掩的高興勁，簡直就像是身處在游樂園之中一樣。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 两人走出了陌生城市车站的剪票口。{n}真里亚和母亲一起走过人行横道时，那难掩的高兴劲，简直就像是身处在游乐园之中一样。
Italian (IT): Le due si allontanarono dai tornelli della stazione di una città a loro sconosciuta.{n}Maria camminò sulle strisce pedonali con sua madre, ridacchiando come se stesse passeggiando in un parco divertimenti.
Turkish (TR): İkili bu bilinmeyen kentteki istasyonun turnikelerinden dışarı çıktılar.{n}Maria annesiyle birlikte yaya geçidinden geçerken, sanki bir lunaparkta yürüyormuş gibi çok mutlu hissediyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): Both faces were still deep red, ......but warmth could be seen between the two of them, mother and child, as they smiled at each other awkwardly...
Steam (ST): Both faces were still deep red, ...but the two of them, mother and child, smiled warmly at each other without any restraint...
Original Witch Hunt (OG): Both faces were still deep red, ......but the two of them, mother and child, smiled at each other without any restraint, looking warm...
PC Japanese (JP): まだ互いの顔は真っ赤だったけど、……ぎこちなくも笑いあう二人の親子は温かに見えた…。
Russian (RU): Оба лица всё ещё были тёмно‐красными... но мать и дочь улыбались друг другу, не сдерживая себя, с теплотой во взгляде...
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Ambos os rostos ainda estavam com um tom de vermelho‐vivo, ......mas era possível sentir o calor entre as duas, mãe e filha, sorrindo calorosamente uma para a outra...
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然她們兩人的臉都還通紅通紅的，……但這笨拙地談笑著的母女二人，看起來卻很是溫馨…。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然她们两人的脸都还通红通红的，……但这笨拙地谈笑着的母女二人，看起来却很是温馨…。
Italian (IT): Entrambi i loro volti erano arrossati... ma madre e figlia ridevano goffamente con un'aria affettuosa...
Turkish (TR): İkisinin de yüzü hâlâ kıpkırmızıydı, ......ama birbirlerine garip bir şekilde gülümseyen anne ve çocuk arasında bir sıcaklık hissedilebiliyordu...

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Dear. What are you doing in a place like this?"
Steam (ST): "......Dear, what are you doing in a place like this?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「………あなた。こんなところでどうされたのですか。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「………あなた。こんなところでどうされたのですか」
Russian (RU): ".........Дорогой. Что ты делаешь в таком месте?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ".........Querido. O que você está fazendo em um lugar como este?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「………老公。你怎麼待在這種地方。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「………老公。你怎么待在这种地方。」
Italian (IT): "...Caro. Che cosa ci fai da queste parti?"
Turkish (TR): ".........Hayatım. Böyle bir yerde ne yapıyorsun?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Umineko Project (UP): "Oh, it's you. .........It's nothing. It's just that this was a pleasant place to think."
Steam (ST): "Oh, it's you. ......It's nothing. I just find this a pleasant place to think."
Original Witch Hunt (OG): [=UP]
PC Japanese (JP): 「君か。………何でもない。考え事をするのに、ここが少し心地よかっただけだ。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「君か。………何でもない。考え事をするのに、ここが少し心地よかっただけだ」
Russian (RU): "О, это ты. .........Ничего особенного. Просто так, нашёл место, чтобы подумать."
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "Ah, é você? .........Nada. É só que este era um lugar agradável para pensar."
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「是你啊。………沒事。只是在這裡想事情能稍微感覺舒服點而已。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「是你啊。………没事。只是在这里想事情能稍微感觉舒服点而已。」
Italian (IT): "Oh, sei tu... Non è niente. È solo che qui mi trovo a mio agio a riflettere."
Turkish (TR): "Oh, sensin. .........Hiçbir şey. Sadece buranın düşünmek için hoş bir yer olduğunu düşündüm."

Speaker: Ushiromiya Natsuhi
Umineko Project (UP): "...I have finished all the preparations for today. For now, shall we relax and wait while drinking some tea?"
Steam (ST): "...All of our preparations for today have been completed. Why don't we have some tea and relax while we wait?"
Original Witch Hunt (OG): "...I'm finishing all of today's preparations. For now, shall we relax and wait while drinking tea?"
PC Japanese (JP): 「…今日の準備は全て手配が終わっています。あとはお茶でも飲みながら寛いで待とうではありませんか。」
PS3 Japanese - Censored (JPC): 「…今日の準備は全て手配が終わっています。あとはお茶でも飲みながら寛いで待とうではありませんか」
Russian (RU): "...Я заканчиваю все сегодняшние приготовления. Может, пока что отдохнем и выпьем чаю?"
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): "...Todas as preparações para hoje estão terminadas. Por ora, devemos relaxar e esperar enquanto bebemos um pouco de chá?"
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 「…今天的準備工作已經全部安排好了。接下來不如就喝喝茶，放寬心等著吧。」
Chinese Simplified (CN): 「…今天的准备工作已经全部安排好了。接下来不如就喝喝茶，放宽心等着吧。」
Italian (IT): "...Ho terminato tutti i preparativi della giornata di oggi. Nel frattempo, che ne dici di rilassarci ed aspettare mentre beviamo del tè?"
Turkish (TR): "...Bugün için tüm hazırlıkları bitirdim. Şimdilik, dinlenirken biraz çay içerek bekleyelim mi?"

Speaker: Ushiromiya Krauss
Umineko Project (UP): ".........Sorry. I'm always pushing all my problems on you."

Umineko Project (UP): She spoke words to reward Krauss for the difficulties of his work, ...but Natsuhi was herself the one who knew best that it wasn't going well.
Steam (ST): She complimented Krauss on his hard work, ...but Natsuhi knew better than anyone that his work wasn't going well.

Umineko Project (UP): ...Krauss's enterprises were something like a seesaw where large amounts of money swung.
Steam (ST): ...Krauss's project was something like a seesaw where a large amount of money swings.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): ...Krauss's project was something like a seesaw where a large amount of money swings.
PC Japanese (JP): …蔵臼の事業は大きなカネが動くシーソーのようなもの。
Russian (RU): ...Проект Краусса был подобен качелям, на которых лежали большие деньги.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): ...Os empreendimentos de Krauss eram algo como uma gangorra onde grandes quantias de dinheiro balançavam.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): …藏臼所做的事業，就如同一塊會牽動龐大資金的蹺蹺板。
Chinese Simplified (CN): …藏臼所做的事业，就如同一块会牵动庞大资金的跷跷板。
Italian (IT): Il progetto di Klaus era paragonabile ad un'altalena a due, dove pendeva una grande quantità di denaro.
Turkish (TR): ...Krauss'un girişimleri, büyük miktarlarda paranın savrulduğu bir tür tahterevalliye benziyordu.

Umineko Project (UP): A big investment leads to a large return, but the swaying of a large‐scale seesaw is large yet sluggish, and not something which shows immediate results.
Steam (ST): Big investments can lead to massive payoffs, but like large seesaws, they tend to shake a lot while moving very slowly, instead of showing immediate results.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): A big investment is linked to large collateral, but with a large-sized seesaw, the swaying is greatly slowed, and it's not something which shows immediate results.
PC Japanese (JP): 大きな投資は大きな見返りに結びつくが、規模の大きなシーソーは揺れが大きくも緩慢で、すぐに結果が出るものではない。
Russian (RU): Крупные инвестиции связаны с большим имущественным залогом, но чем больше размер качелей, тем медленнее их движение, и это не может дать моментальных результатов.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Um grande investimento leva a um grande retorno, mas o balanço de uma gangorra de larga‐escala é grande, ainda que lento, e não é algo que mostra resultados imediatos.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 雖然巨大的投資聯結著巨大的回報，但規模巨大的蹺蹺板搖動幅度很大，起伏速度也很是緩慢，因此不是馬上就能得出結果來的。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 虽然巨大的投资联结着巨大的回报，但规模巨大的跷跷板摇动幅度很大，起伏速度也很是缓慢，因此不是马上就能得出结果来的。
Italian (IT): Investimenti notevoli portano a guadagni notevoli, ma in un'altalena di grandi dimensioni l'oscillazione è molto lenta, e l'esito non è immediatamente visibile.
Turkish (TR): Büyük bir yatırım büyük bir getiri sağlar, ancak büyük çaplı bir tahterevallinin sallantısı da büyük ancak ağırdır ve hemen sonuç veren bir şey değildir.

Umineko Project (UP): At times, he would make more investments so that the seesaw inclined faster towards the good side.
Steam (ST): At times, it's possible to make further investments, so that the seesaw inclines faster towards the side you want.
Original Witch Hunt (OG): At times, you make more investments so that the seesaw inclines faster towards the good side.
PC Japanese (JP): 時に、そのシーソーが早く良い方へ傾くよう、さらに投資をすることもある。
Russian (RU): Время от времени, вы вкладываете больше инвестиций, вместе с тем ускоряя движение качелей.
Brazilian Portuguese (PT): Às vezes, ele faria mais investimentos para que a gangorra se inclinasse mais rápido em direção ao lado bom.
Chinese Traditional (CHT): 時而也會有為了讓這蹺蹺板盡快傾向好的一方面，而再追加投資的情況出現。
Chinese Simplified (CN): 时而也会有为了让这跷跷板尽快倾向好的一方面，而再追加投资的情况出现。
Italian (IT): A volte, si effettuano ulteriori investimenti per far sì che l'altalena si inclini più velocemente verso la parte favorevole...
Turkish (TR): Yeri geldiğinde tahterevallinin olumlu tarafa daha hızlı eğilmesi için daha fazla yatırım yapardı.

Umineko Project (UP): ......Naturally, he did that because he had the confidence that, in a not‐so‐distant future, he would be able to recover all the investments made.
Steam (ST): ...Of course, you'd only do that if you were confident you'd be able to recover all your investments in the not-so-distant future.

Umineko Project (UP): Due to its great popularity, there was always someone playing on it, so if he wanted to play, he would have to wait a long time for his turn.
Steam (ST): It's a really popular item, so there's always someone playing on it, and you've got to wait a long time for your turn.

Umineko Project (UP): ...And then, one day, he found that seesaw vacant, straddled it realizing he was the first to arrive, and had it all to himself.

Italian (IT): E un giorno, qualcuno trova quell'altalena libera e ci sale sopra, essendo il primo ad arrivare, tenendola tutta per sé.
